en.name: Category
en.text: [Category] Which mobile device are you looking for 😉:

children.name: 📲 Tablets
children.text: [Category] Which tablets are you looking for 🔍:

children.name: Galaxy Book
children.description:
✔️ OS: Windows 10 Home
✔️ Display size: 10.6 - 12
✔️ A refined S Pen

children.name: Galaxy Tab
children.description:
✔️ Write naturally
✔️ Not just any pen
✔️ Battery: 6000 mAh, Video Playback: 12hrs

children.name: Galaxy View
children.description:
✔️ Wirelessly connected
✔️ Effortless Mobility
✔️ Family Square

children.name: 📱 Smartphones
children.text: [Category] Which phones are you looking for 🔍:

children.name: Galaxy A
children.description:
✔️ HD Display
✔️ Expandable Memory
✔️ Fingerprint Sensor
✔️ HD Video Recording

children.name: Galaxy C
children.description:
✔️ HD Display
✔️ Main Camera: CMOS 5.0 MP - 13.0 MP
✔️ Display: 4.3 - 5.0

children.name: Galaxy J
children.description:
✔️ HD Display
✔️ Main Camera: CMOS 5.0 MP - 13.0 MP
 ✔️ Main Display: 4.3" - 5.0"

children.name: Galaxy Note
children.description:
✔️ Main Display: 5.5" - 5.7"
✔️ Main Camera: CMOS 8.0 MP - 16.0 MP

children.name: Galaxy S
children.description:
✔️ Iris Scanning
✔️ Fingerprint Scanner
✔️ Expandable Memory
✔️ Water-resistant
